sentences.sContent: We will examine each of these methods in turn.
sentences.sContent_eng: We will examine each of these methods in turn.
sentences.sCn: 我们将按照顺序依次分析这些方法。

sentences.sContent: This, in turn, would require changes to all users of those interfaces.
sentences.sContent_eng: This, in turn, would require changes to all users of those interfaces.
sentences.sCn: 依次的，这需要那些接口的所有用户作出相应的改变。
